G

GameTools - Class in eu.clementime.rds
Game tools manage all tools that are used to play: pointers, moving arrows and action manager.
GameTools(DatabaseHandler, Context, Engine, Scene) - Constructor for class eu.clementime.rds.GameTools
Game items, including action manager, and fonts are loaded and created directly in the constructor.
gameTools - Variable in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
Moving arrows, pointers, icons, action manager.
garbageCollector() - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Screen
When changing screen, all sprites, touch areas and updatehandlers about this screen have to be removed properly.

getPlayingHand() - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.GameTools

getYVelocity(int) - Method in class eu.clementime.rds.Doll
